Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Wahibramakhet born of Sedy with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard(damaged), crossed hands in relief holding two hoes and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of the Dead in eight rows of incised hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
